item.title: Question related to server ip
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

[quote=“Gorilla Sto, post:1, topic:321474”]Hey, this is my first post here on Moparscape, and I am fairly new to these so called private servers.
I am putting up a server for me and my friends to mess around on at school, and I was wondering how I can change this:

[code] public static void main(String args[])
{

        try
	{
            
   
	}
        catch(Exception exception)
        {
            return;
        }
	finally{
            anInt957 = 10;
            anInt958 = 0;
            aBoolean959 = true;
            
   	    try {
            signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());
                }
	    catch(UnknownHostException uhe) {
		return;
	    }
            client client1 = new client();
            client1.method1(503, false, 765);
            return;
	}
      
}[/code]

To my actual server ip.
Help is very much appreciated.[/quote]
I see nothing in here related to server IP’s

Read full topic

item.title: Question related to server ip
item.dc:creator: @Gorilla_Sto Gorilla Sto
item.description:
@Gorilla_Sto wrote:

Hey, this is my first post here on Moparscape, and I am fairly new to these so called private servers.
I am putting up a server for me and my friends to mess around on at school, and I was wondering how I can change this:

signlink.storeid = 32; //not really needed for us signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); method2(503, false, 765); //sets gameframe size } catch(Exception exception) { return; } }

To my actual server ip.
Help is very much appreciated.

Read full topic
